data.title: CSN Box Set Discography
data.text:
DISCOGRAPHY

Mike Bloomfield – Al Kooper – Steve Stills

Super Session

Columbia 9701

Released on July 22, 1968

Albert’s Shuffle – Stop – Man’s Temptation – His Holy Modal Majesty – Really – It Takes A Lot To Laugh, It Takes A Train To Cry – Season Of The Witch – You Don’t Love Me – Harvey’s Tune

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Atlantic 19117

Released on May 29, 1969

Suite: Judy Blue Eyes – Marrakesh Express – Guinnevere – You Don’t Have To Cry – Pre-Road Downs – Wooden Ships – Lady Of The Island – Helplessly Hoping – Long Time Gone – 49 Bye-Byes

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young

Déjà vu

Atlantic 19118

Released on March 11, 1970

Carry On – Teach Your Children – Almost Cut My Hair – Helpless – Woodstock – Déjà Vu – Our House – 4 + 20 – Country Girl [a. Whiskey Boot Hill/b. Down, Down, Down,/c. “Country Girl” (I Think You’re Pretty)

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Stephen Stills

Atlantic 7202

Released on November 16, 1970

Love The One You’re With – Do For The Others – Church (Part Of Someone) – Old Times Good Times – Go Back Home – Sit Yourself Down – To A Flame – Black Queen – Cherokee – We Are Not Helpless

___________________________________________________________________

David Crosby

If I Could Only Remember My Name

Atlantic 7203

Released on February 22, 1971

Music Is Love – Cowboy Movie – Tamalpais High (At About 3) – Laughing – What Are Their Names – Traction In The Rain – Song With No Words (Tree With No Leaves) – Orleans – I’d Swear There Was Someone There

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young

4 Way Street

Atlantic 902

Released on April 7, 1971

Suite: Judy Blue Eyes – On The Way Home – Teach Your Children – Triad – The Lee Shore – Chicago – Right Between The Eyes – Cowgirl In The Sand – Don’t Let It Bring You Down – 49 Bye Byes / America’s Children – Love The One You’re With – Pre-Road Downs – Long Time Gone – Southern Man – Ohio – Carry On – Find The Cost Of Freedom

___________________________________________________________________

Graham Nash

Songs For Beginners

Atlantic 7204

Released on May 28, 1971

Military Madness – Better Days – Wounded Bird – I Used To Be A King – Be Yourself – Simple Man – Man In The Mirror – There’s Only One – Sleep Song – Chicago – We Can Change The World

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Stephen Stills 2

Atlantic 7206

Released on June 30, 1971

Change Partners – Nothin’ To Do But Today – Fishes And Scorpions – Sugar Babe – Know You Got To Run – Open Secret – Relaxing Town – Singin’ Call – Ecology Song – Word Games – Marianne – Bluebird Revisted

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby & Nash

Graham Nash/David Crosby

Atlantic 7220

Released on April 5, 1972

Southbound Train – Whole Cloth – Blacknotes – Strangers Room – Where Will I Be – Page 43 – Frozen Smiles – Games – Girl To Be On My Mind – The Wall Song – Immigration Man

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Manassas

Atlantic 903

Released on April 12, 1972

THE RAVEN: Song Of Love (a. Rock & Roll Crazies/b. Cuban Bluegrass) – Jet Set (Sign) – Anyway – Both Of Us (Bound To Lose) – THE WILDERNESS: Fallen Eagle – Jesus Gave Love Away For Free – Colorado – So Begins The Task – Hide It So Deep – Don’t Look At My Shadow – CONSIDER: It Doesn’t Matter – Johnny’s Garden – Bound To Fall – How Far – Move Around – The Love Gangster ROCK & ROLL IS HERE TO STAY: What To Do – Right Now – The Treasure (Take One) – Blues Man

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Manassas Down The Road

Atlantic 7250

Released on April 23, 1973

Isn’t It About Time – Lies – Pensamiento – So Many Times – Business On The Street – Do You Remember The Americans – Down The Road – City Junkies – Guaguanco De Vero – Rollin’ My Stone

___________________________________________________________________

Graham Nash

Wild Tales

Atlantic 7288

Released on January 2, 1974

Wild Tales – Hey You (Looking At The Moon) – Prison Song – You’ll Never Be The Same – And So It Goes – Grave Concern – Oh! Camil (The Winter Soldier) – I Miss You – On The Line – Another Sleep Song

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

So Far

Atlantic 19119

Released on August 19, 1994

Déjà vu – Helplessly Hoping – Wooden Ships – Teach Your Children – Ohio – Find The Cost Of Freedom – Woodstock – Our House – Helpless – Guinnevere – Suite: Judy Blue Eyes

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Stills

Columbia 33575

Released in June, 1975

Turn Back The Pages – My Favorite Changes – My Angel – In The Way – Love Story – To Mama From Christopher And The Old Man – First Things First – New Mama – As I Come Of Age – Shuffle Just As Bad – Cold Cold World – Myth Of Sisyphus

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby And Nash

Wind On The Water

ABC 902

Released on September 15, 1975

Carry Me – Mama Lion – Bittersweet – Take The Money And Run – Naked In The Rain – Love Work Out – Low Down Payment – Cowboy Of Dreams – Homeward Through The Haze – Fieldworker – To The Last Whale … (A. Critical Mass/B. Wind On The Water)

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Stephen Stills Live

Atlantic 18156

Released on December 4, 1975

Wooden Ships – Four Days Gone – a. Jet Set (Sigh)/b. Rocky Mountain Way/c. Jet Set (Sigh) – Special Care – Change Partners – a. Crossroads/b. You Can’t Catch Me – Everybody’s Talkin’ At Me – 4 + 20 – Word Game

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Illegal Stills

Columbia 34148

Released in March, 1976

Buyin’ Time – Midnight In Paris – Different Tongues – Soldier – The Loner – Stateline Blues – Closer To You – No Me Niegas – Ring Of Love – Circlin’

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby And Nash

Whistling Down The Wire

ABC 956

Released on June 25, 1976

Spotlight – Broken Bird – Time After Time – Dancer – Mutiny – J.B.’s Blues – Marguerita – Taken It All – Foolish Man – Out Of The Darkness

___________________________________________________________________

The Stills-Young Band

Long May You Run

Reprise 2253

Released on September 10, 1976

Long My You Run – Make Love To You – Midnight On The Bay – Black Coral – Ocean Girl - Let It Shine – 12/8 Blues – Fountainebleau – Guardian Angel

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Still Stills: The Best of Stephen Stills

Atlantic 18201

Released on December 2, 1976

Love The One You’re With – It Doesn’t Matter – We Are Not Helpless – Marianne – Bound To Fall – Isn’t It About Time – Change Partners – Go Back Home – Johnny’s Garden – a. Rock & Roll Crazies/b. Cuban Bluegrass – Sit Yourself Down

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

CSN

Atlantic 19104

Released on June 17, 1977

Shadow Captain – See The Changes – Carried Away – Fair Game – Anything At All – Cathedral – Dark Star – Just A Song Before I Go – Run From Tears – Cold Rain – In My Dreams – I Give You Give Blind

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby And Nash

Crosby-Nash Live

ABC/Atlantic

1977

Immigration Man – The Lee Shore – I Used To Be A King – Page 43 – Fieldworker – Simple Man – Foolish Man – Mama Lion – Déjà vu

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Thoroughfare Gap

Columbia 35380

Released in September, 1978

You Can’t Dance Alone – Thoroughfare Gap – We Will Go On – Beaucoup Yumbo – What’s The Game – Midnight Rider – Woman Lleva – Lowdown – Not Fade Away – Can’t Get No Booty

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby And Nash

Crosby & Nash Greatest Hits

ABC/Atlantic

1978

Love Work Out – The Wall Song – Wild Tales – Carry Me – Out Of The Darkness – Southbound Train – Chicago – Bittersweet – To The Last Whale…(A. Critical Mass/B. Wind On The Water)

___________________________________________________________________

Graham Nash

Earth & Sky

Capitol 12014

Released on February 15, 1980

Earth & Sky – Love Has Come – Out On The Island – Skychild – Helicopter Song – Barrel Of Pain (Half Life) – T.V. Guide – It’s All Right – Magical Child – In The 80’s

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Replay

Atlantic 16026

Released on December 8, 1980

Carry On – Marrakesh Express – Just A Song Before I Go – First Things First – Shadow Captain – To The Last Whale … (A. Critical Mass/B. Wind On The Water) – Love The One You’re With – Pre-Road Downs – Change Partners – I Give You Give Blind – Cathedral

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Daylight Again

Atlantic 19360

Released on June 21, 1982

Turn Your Back On Love – Wasted On The Way – Southern Cross – Into The Darkness – Delta – Since I Met You – Too Much Love To Hide – Song For Susan – You Are Alive – Might As Well Have A Good Time – Daylight Again

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Allies

Atlantic 80075

Released on June 6, 1983

War Games – Raise A Voice – Turn Your Back On Love – Barrel Of Pain – Shadow Captain – Dark Star – Blackbird – He Played Real Good For Free – Wasted On The Way – For What It’s Worth

___________________________________________________________________

Stephen Stills

Right By You

Atlantic 80177

Released on July 30, 1984

50/50 – Stranger – Flaming Heart – Love Again – No Problem – Can’t Let Go – Grey To Green – Only Love Can Break Your Heart – No Hiding Place – Right By You

___________________________________________________________________

Graham Nash

Innocent Eyes

Atlantic 81633

Released on March 27, 1986

See You In Prague – Keep Away From Me – Innocent Eyes – Chippin’ Away – Over The Wall – Don’t Listen To The Rumors – Sad Eyes – Newday – Glass And Steel – I Got A Rock

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young

American Dream

Atlantic 81888

Released on November 3, 1988

American Dream – Got It Made – Name Of Love – Don’t Say Good-Bye – This Old Home – Nighttime For Generals – Shadowland – Drivin’ Thunder – Clear Blue Skies – That Girl – Compass – Soldiers Of Peace – Feel Your Love – Night Song

___________________________________________________________________

David Crosby

Oh Yes I Can

A&M 5232

Released on January 23, 1989

Drive My Car – Melody – Monkey And The Underdog – In The Wide Ruin – Tracks In The Dust – Drop Down Mama – Lady Of The Harbor – Distances – Flying Man – Oh Yes I Can – My Country ‘Tis Of Thee

___________________________________________________________________

Crosby, Stills & Nash

Live It Up

Atlantic 32107

Released on June 11, 1990

Live It Up – If Anybody Had A Heart – Tomboy – Haven’t We Lost Enough? – Yours And Mine – (Got To Keep) Open – Straight Line – House Of Broken Dreams – Arrows – After The Dolphin

Back to Crosby, Stills & Nash Main Page

To the Crosby, Stills & Nash box set tracklist

To the CSN Discography
